text.div:
ParticipantType

This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate how an individual parcitipates in an encounter

This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/participant-type

CodeDisplayDefinition
admitterAdmitterThe practitioner responsible for admitting a patient to a hospital or other inpatient health facility
dischargerDischargerThe practitioner responsible for discharging the patient from a hospital or other inpatient health facility
attendingAttendingThe practitioner responsible for overseeing a patient's care during the encounter
consultingConsultingAn advisor participating in the service by performing evaluations and making recommendations
referrerReferrerThe practitioner that referred the patient to another practitioner
translatorTranslatorA translator who is facilitating communication with the patient during the encounter
emergencyEmergencyA person to be contacted in case of an emergency during the encounter
dischargeDischargeA person to be contacted when the patient is discharged
